channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Original Thomas Jefferson letter will hit the auction block on July 4th

item.title: America Will Be Better Off, And More Self-Reliant, Without Illegal Immigrant Labor
